name: Colossus (itch) (numian)
description:
You must defeat a colossal enemy with only arrows. Attack its weak point for massive damage. If the colossus touch you, you are death.

What this game is going to be:

  • Singleplayer mode where you need to defeat the colossus.
  • Local multiplayer where a player controls the horse archer (gamepad) and the other the colossus (mouse).

I have made available a WIP of the game. It is still missing a couple of things.
